text:
Hey devs!
I’m currently building a React app for a company based on HubSpot auth and data. Does anyone have any resources you would like to share on the topic of building SPA and integrating it with HubSpot?
I’ve built React apps previously and I’m familiar with the ecosystem, I’m just new to integrating it with HubSpot API so I’m looking for some resources to make the process easier for me.

Thanks in advance! :slightly_smiling_face:
